history.proof: intros Q p H. inversion H; subst. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : list (Term A n) H : reducestar Q (pO A n) p H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pO A n) p H1 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p Unable to unify "pO A n" with "p".

exceptions.tactic: assert(H2: reduceto Q (pO A n) x).

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : list (Term A n) H : reducestar Q (pO A n) p H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pO A n) p H1 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p Unable to unify "reduceplus ?M2192 ?M2193 ?M2194 ?M2195 ?M2197 ?M2198 ?M2199 ?M2200 ?M2202 ?M2203 ?M2204 ?M2205 ?M2207 ?M2208 (mults ?M2199 (invTerm ?M2197 (T1 ?M2194 ?M2203)) ?M2209)" with "p = pO A n".

original: intros Q p H. inversion H; subst. - reflexivity. - assert(H2: reduceto Q (pO A n) x). { apply reduceplus_mults_invr. auto. } contradiction.
